person.persName: James Thomas Dalton (Caldwell County, KY, farmer and serg. 17th ky cav.)

body.p: Caldwell County, Kentucky, farmer and soldier. Tennessee native. Son of Reuben B. Dalton and Lucinda Dalton. Married to Margaret Adeline Dalton. Father of Candace B. Dalton. Student in Caldwell County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Fredonia in 1860. Served in the 17th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a private, corporal, and sergeant from April 10, 1865, to September 20, 1865.
